name: goal
description: User's primary reason for investing (e.g., retirement, growth, passive income).

name: horizon
description: How long the user plans to stay invested (short, medium, long-term).

name: risk_appetite
description: User’s willingness to take financial risk (Low, Moderate, High).

name: loss_tolerance
description: User’s emotional and behavioral response to investment losses.

name: knowledge_level
description: User’s self-assessed experience and understanding of investing.

name: return_expectation
description: Expected annual return from the investment (e.g., 5%, 10%, 15%).

name: liquidity_needs
description: Whether the user needs quick access to invested money or can stay locked in.
